lead_paragraph: Foursquare’s chief executive sees the partnership as a way to enhance his service with additional tips about restaurants and other locations.
snippet: Foursquare’s chief executive sees the partnership as a way to enhance his service with additional tips about restaurants and other locations.

headline.main: Bravo Works With Foursquare to Engage TV Fans on Phones
headline.seo: Bravo Works With a Gaming Platform, Foursquare, to Engage TV Fans on Phones
